name: Burger Stack (Impbox Games)
description:
For LOWREZJAM2021 - 64x64 pixels

Tips:
You can build a Burger and turn it into a Cheeseburger, hold Up+Z to pick up the top bread from the burger, pick up a slice of cheese, drop both onto the burger, it's now a Cheeseburger!

Controls:
Keyboard:

Arrow keys - Movement
Z: Pick up item near hand / Use held tool
X: Drop held item
C: Info about item near hand, press again to cycle between multiple items

Z + Up: Pick up top item from stack
X + Up: Drop top item from held stack

M: Toggle Music
Escape: Menu

Note if you're using QWERTZ layout you can use Y as Z.

Gamepad (Xbox layout):

D-Pad/LeftAnalog Stick: Movement
A: Pick up item near hand / Use held tool
B: Drop held item
Y: Info about item near hand, press again to cycle between multiple items

A + Up: Pick up top item from stack
B + Up: Drop top item from held stack

Supports 2 Player Local Co-op, Select Co-op from the main menu

Story mode and Challenges are single player only

Made with Nico game framework in Nim
